Posts.Content: Hi all, i have been informed today that  i have to have my mirena coil changed to a normal one, as if i have not been interfered with enough already. hopefully they(lovely oncologists) will axplain to me why, tomorrow at my next appointment. already feel that all i do is moan and complain about having no control over my  life and making decisions. feel slightly frustrated today and need to get things off my chest (pardon the pun).oh and can't seem to find a wig to fit or suit my huge head! aaaaarrrrgggghhhh. rant over. on a good note i finished all my xmas shopping today. woohoo! keep smiling everyone, we will beat it.x
Posts.Title: contraception?

Posts.Content: hi mj, thank you for your reply. hope you are doing ok and everything goes well tomorrow.  x
Posts.Title: her2 positive help

Posts.Content: hi mandy, that would be good as we seem to be starting the same treatment. hopefully we wont feel too bad to chat. good luck michaela x
Posts.Title: her2 positive help

Posts.Content: i am a 44 year old who had a lumpectomy and breast conserving surgery 2 weeks ago. i have had my results back and it seems i have a her2 positive cancer, is there anyone who has this type of cancer who can give me more info. i start my chemo and herceptin after christmas. i am absolutely terrified for my future.
